name: Traditional Rice
description: Authentic Sri Lankan traditional rice varieties cultivated using sustainable and science-backed farming methods.
fullDescription: Our traditional rice plantations focus exclusively on preserving and cultivating Sri Lanka’s ancient rice varieties such as Suwandel, Pachchaperumal, Kuruluthuda, Kalu Heenati, and Madathawalu. By combining time-tested traditional knowledge with modern agricultural science, we ensure high nutritional value, purity, and long-term sustainability. As the only plantation company dedicated solely to traditional rice, we are committed to safeguarding this heritage for future generations while preparing it for global markets.

name: Pineapple
description: Premium Sri Lankan pineapple cultivated using sustainable farming practices, known for its rich sweetness and vibrant aroma.
fullDescription: Our pineapple fields are located in nutrient-rich Sri Lankan soil, producing juicy and aromatic fruits through eco-friendly farming techniques. With optimal irrigation and natural pest management, we ensure premium-quality pineapples for both local and global markets.

name: Ginger
description: High-quality ginger cultivated in nutrient-rich soil, prized for its aroma, pungency, and medicinal value.
fullDescription: Our ginger cultivation utilizes fertile Sri Lankan soil and organic farming practices to produce highly aromatic rhizomes. Each batch is carefully harvested and processed to maintain purity, medicinal value, and export-grade quality.

name: Guava
description: Fresh Sri Lankan guava cultivated for exceptional sweetness, aroma, and nutritional richness.
fullDescription: Our guava orchards thrive in Sri Lanka’s ideal tropical climate. Grown with organic methods, these guavas deliver exceptional taste and high levels of vitamin C. Fruits are harvested at peak ripeness to maintain quality and freshness.

name: Sea Food
description: A diverse range of premium seafood sourced and cultivated from Sri Lanka’s pristine coastal and deep-sea environments.
fullDescription: Our Sea Food category represents Sri Lanka’s rich marine heritage, combining sustainable aquaculture and responsible ocean harvesting. From coastal farms to deep Indian Ocean waters, we produce export-grade seafood including cuttlefish, prawns, tuna, and mud crab, all processed under strict quality and hygiene standards.

name: Pomegranate
description: Premium pomegranates cultivated in dry-zone regions of Sri Lanka with exceptional sweetness and vibrant color.
fullDescription: Our pomegranate orchards produce fruits with deep red arils and rich antioxidant content. Managed with precision irrigation and sustainable field practices, our pomegranates deliver consistent size, sweetness, and export-ready quality.

name: Vegetables
description: Mixed vegetable cultivation across 30 acres, producing export-grade, pesticide-controlled, fresh vegetables.
fullDescription: Our mixed vegetable plantations include a diverse range of crops such as okra, beans, tomatoes, eggplant, cucumbers, chilies, pumpkins, and leafy greens. Using modern irrigation and integrated pest management, we supply high-quality vegetables for supermarkets and export markets.
